info-modal.title: What's Pick a Sam?
info-modal.explanation: Help me choose the best profile pictures for my dating apps ! This app allows you to vote for your favorite pictures. Everybody can vote and the highest rated pictures will be chosen 🔥
info-modal.results-subtitle: How can I see the results ?
info-modal.results-text: I might add a page to see the results live on this website at some point, but for now, only I can see the results 😎 Or you can try to find me on Tinder to see which pictures I've used 😂
info-modal.github-text: Ain't no way I'm explaining everything in this pop-up but you can check on your own by taking a look at the source code 🤓 :

match.title: Select your favorite photo 💕
match.error: Oops ! An error occurred, refresh the page to show the pictures 🙏

rankings.error: Oops ! An error occurred, refresh the page to show the rankings 🙏
rankings.title: Pictures Ranking
